answers.answer: If the swelling won't go down at all even after you elevate your feet you may have preeclampsia.
But what if they don't go down but my blood pressure is completely fine I'm always 120 over 80 very single appt and anytime I check my blood pressure at home
Elevate your feet. The swelling will go down a little but might not go back to normal till after baby comes
Thank you girl.. lol that preclamsia word just scares me lol. My blood pressure is always normal and perfect can you have it and have normal blood pressure

question: So my feet are so swollen they look like the women off the movie Shallow Hal lmfao.. what can I do to take the swelling down I keep drinking water. They kind of hurt
title: SWOLLEN FEET
